original_text: And that son that is priest in his stead shall put them on seven days, when he cometh into the tabernacle of the congregation to minister in the holy place.
korean_text: 그를 이어 제사장이 되는 아들이 회막에 들어가서 성소에서 섬길 때에는 이레 동안 그것을 입을지니라

sentences.original_text: that is priest in his stead
shall put them on seven days
when he cometh into the tabernacle of the congregation
to minister in the holy place
